pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides Some Useful Functions for Making Statistical Tables // You can use the functions provided by the package to make various statistical tables, such as baseline data tables. Creates 'Table 1', i.e., a description of the baseline patient characteristics, which is essential in every medical research. Supports both continuous and categorical variables, as well as p-values and standardized mean differences. This method was described by Mary L McHugh (2013) doi:10.11613/bm.2013.018.
